The elderly are likely to excel at wearing jackets in cold weather due to their increased sensitivity to cold temperatures and decreased mobility. As people age, their bodies produce less heat, making them more susceptible to hypothermia and other cold-related illnesses. Wearing a jacket can help to keep them warm and comfortable in cold weather, and can also provide additional protection against wind and precipitation.
